Body:
hmd = ccl.halos.MassDef200c()
mf = ccl.halos.MassFuncBocquet16(cosmo, hmd)
d_hmf = np.loadtxt(os.path.join(dirdat, 'hmf_bocquet16.txt'), unpack=True)
m = d_hmf[0]
for iz, z in enumerate(zs):
    nm_d = d_hmf[iz + 1]
    nm_h = mf.get_mass_function(cosmo, m, 1.0 / (1 + z))
    assert np.all(np.fabs(nm_h / nm_d - 1) < 0.01)
